maker: Globe designed and assembled by Jean-Antoine Nollet, Map engraved by Nicolas Bailleul le jeune, lacquer decoration attributed to the Workshop of Guillaume Martin, et al
title: Celestial Globe (Globe céleste)
description: Celestial Globe (Globe céleste); Globe designed and assembled by Jean-Antoine Nollet (French, 1700 - 1770), Map engraved by Nicolas Bailleul le jeune (French, active 1740s), lacquer decoration attributed to the Workshop of Guillaume Martin (French, 1689 - 1749), et al; Paris, France; 1730; Printed paper, papier-mâché, poplar, spruce, and alder painted with vernis Martin, bronze; 109.9 x 44.5 x 31.8 cm (43 1/4 x 17 1/2 x 12 1/2 in.); 86.DH.705.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
